EnumerableMapNonexistentKey(bytes32).details: Query for a nonexistent map key.

InvalidCaller().details: Emitted when the caller is invalid

NotAllowed().details: Emitted when an operation is not allowed for the caller

ParamError().details: Emitted when a function parameter is invalid or out-of-range (e.g. zero batchSize, zero price, etc.)

SafeERC20FailedOperation(address).details: An operation with an ERC-20 token failed.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

params.isFee: Whether this payment is a fee transfer
params.listingId: The ID of the listing being purchased
params.payoutToken: The token received by the recipient (may differ from sourceToken if swapped)
params.slippageBps: The slippage tolerance in basis points used for swaps
params.sourceToken: The source token used for payment
params.swapAmount: The amount received after swap (if performed)
params.swapRequested: Whether a token swap was requested
params.swapSuccessful: Whether the swap was successful (if requested)

params._isProxyOperation: Whether this is a proxy operation
params._listingPayoutCurrency: The currency to payout in from the listing
params._value: The value to process fees for

params._gildiExchange: The address of the GildiExchange contract

params._currency: The address of the currency to convert to
params._priceInUSD: The price in USD to convert

returns._0: The equivalent amount in the specified currency

DEFAULT_SLIPPAGE_BPS.details: Default slippage tolerance in basis points (5%)

priceFeedIds.details: Mapping from currency address to price feed ID

PaymentProcessed(uint256,address,address.notice: Emitted when a payment is processed for a listing purchase or fee transfer

PriceFeedRemoved(address).notice: Emitted when a price feed is removed

PriceFeedSet(address,bytes32).notice: Emitted when a price feed is set

getPriceFeedId(address).notice: Gets the price feed ID for a currency

gildiExchange().notice: The GildiExchange contract that calls this contract

handleProcessPaymentWithFees(uint256,add.notice: Processes payment with fees.      Calculates fees, transfers funds to fee recipients, and optionally creates funds

quoteInCurrency(uint256,address).notice: Converts a price in USD to the equivalent amount in the specified currency

removePriceFeedId(address).notice: Removes a price feed for a currency

setPriceFeedId(address,bytes32).notice: Sets a price feed ID for a currency

userdoc.notice: Handles payment processing, fee calculation, and currency conversions for the Gildi Exchange
